value:
$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|Where...are we? This can't be our
Arcadia, can it?$k$pNo, something is different...
Something that reminds me of
the past...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ルイーズ,ch03_22_Luise_F_Wedding19,Face|Igrene!$k$p$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|Hm? L-Lady Louise?!$k$pI can't believe it!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ルイーズ,ch03_22_Luise_F_Wedding19,Face|My, how little Igrene has grown!$k$pIf only your father Lord Hawkeye
could see you. I am sure he would
be proud.$k$p$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|Wh-what... What is this place?$k$pLady Louise, you look just as you
did 20 years ago...as if no time has
passed since I met you as a child...$k$pWell, your outfit is a little different...$k$p$WmMPID_花婿パント,ch03_23_Pant_F_Wedding19,Face|This is called the Tempest. Here,
time and space become tangled and
distorted... Rather intriguing, isn't it?$k$pPerhaps this...is the Arcadia of our
time—or, when we last met.$k$pFor you, it seems 20 years have
passed, so to you, this would be
the Arcadia of 20 years ago.$k$p$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|Twenty years...$k$p$WmMPID_花婿パント,ch03_23_Pant_F_Wedding19,Face|Indeed. Now, though I would love to
savor this reunion longer, it seems
we are short on time.$k$pWill you aid us in returning this world
to its natural state?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ルイーズ,ch03_22_Luise_F_Wedding19,Face|Tell me, Igrene. Have you been
practicing with the bow I gave you?$k$p$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|Y-yes. It has been some time...
Let me show you just how far
I've come.$k$p

$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|The Tempest is disappearing... Lord
Pent, Lady Louise, please follow me.$k$p...Hm? Lord Pent? ...Lady Louise?$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_ソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|...grene... Igrene!$k$p$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|...Wh-what?$k$p$WmMPID_ソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Normal,Face|Igrene, are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|This...$k$pThis is Arcadia... Our Arcadia.$k$p$WmMPID_ソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Normal,Face|That's right.$k$p$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|So, I'm back... Twenty years have
passed... It couldn't have been a
dream, could it?$k$p$WmMPID_ソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Normal,Face|Igrene...are you sure you're all right?$k$p$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|Oh, I'm sorry.$k$pI was just dreaming that I met some
people I remember fondly. Lord
Pent and Lady Louise...$k$pI met them when I was very young.$k$p$WmMPID_ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_Normal,Face|Oh! I know them too!$k$pI met them when I was left in charge!
Back when you were still teeny tiny.$k$p$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|Ah, that's right...$k$pYou were here, as always, even
20 years ago...$k$pMuch has happened in the last 20
years, both happy and sad.$k$p$WmMPID_ソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Normal,Face|Igrene, I ask again, are you s—$k$p$WmMPID_イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Normal,Face|I'm all right, Sophia.$k$pI'm just...remembering. I want to keep
everyone safe, like my father... That's
one thing that hasn't changed.$k$pFor the dream of Arcadia—of humans
and dragons living in harmony—I will
press on forever.$k$p
